original_title: Shape Pink Power Flat Abs 5 Ways - PILATES FOR A TIGHTER TUMMY
overview: This is more of a fusion Pilates segment; Smith notes that the moves are inspired by both Pilates and ballet. She starts with a modified roll back and also includes versions of scissors, hip lifts, and teaser; planks with leg movements conclude this routine as well.
title: Shape Pink Power Flat Abs 5 Ways - PILATES FOR A TIGHTER TUMMY
